title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 27, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 27, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Citizen Science
items.content_text:
### Software / Modeling and Computation

*   [BOINC](https://boinc.berkeley.edu/) - Open-source cross-platform volunteer computing network connecting computers of volunteers/citizen scientists to scientific research projects. Used by CERN and universities around the world.
items.content_html:
Software / Modeling and Computation

  • BOINC - Open-source cross-platform volunteer computing network connecting computers of volunteers/citizen scientists to scientific research projects. Used by CERN and universities around the world.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Bayesian Modeling / Bayesian Induction

*   [Theory-based Bayesian models of inductive learning and reasoning](https://www.cell.com/AJHG/fulltext/S1364-6613\(06\)00134-3) - ***Trends in Cognitive Sciences***, 2006. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=6741344960992898446)]. \[[Preprint](http://www.charleskemp.com/papers/TenenbaumGK06.pdf)]. Inductive inference allows humans to make powerful generalizations from sparse data when learning about word meanings, unobserved properties, causal relationships, and many other aspects of the world. Traditional accounts of induction emphasize either the power of statistical learning, or the importance of strong constraints from structured domain knowledge, intuitive theories or schemas. This paper argues that both components are necessary to explain the nature, use and acquisition of human knowledge, and the authors introduce a theory-based Bayesian framework for modeling inductive learning and reasoning as statistical inferences over structured knowledge representations.
items.content_html:
Bayesian Modeling / Bayesian Induction

  • Theory-based Bayesian models of inductive learning and reasoning - Trends in Cognitive Sciences, 2006. [All Versions]. [Preprint]. Inductive inference allows humans to make powerful generalizations from sparse data when learning about word meanings, unobserved properties, causal relationships, and many other aspects of the world. Traditional accounts of induction emphasize either the power of statistical learning, or the importance of strong constraints from structured domain knowledge, intuitive theories or schemas. This paper argues that both components are necessary to explain the nature, use and acquisition of human knowledge, and the authors introduce a theory-based Bayesian framework for modeling inductive learning and reasoning as statistical inferences over structured knowledge representations.

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### CLI

*   [tuibox (⭐206)](https://github.com/Cubified/tuibox) - A single-header terminal UI (TUI) library, capable of creating mouse-driven, interactive applications on the command line. \[MIT]
items.content_html:
CLI

  • tuibox (⭐206) - A single-header terminal UI (TUI) library, capable of creating mouse-driven, interactive applications on the command line. [MIT]

items.title: Discount for Student Dev
items.content_text:
### Security

*   [Shodan](https://help.shodan.io/the-basics/academic-upgrade) \[FREE / CREDIT] - Free upgrade (normally 49$) to gain full access to everything shodan has to offer + 100 Export credits. Simply use your academic email address when you signup.
*   [Malwarebytes](https://www.malwarebytes.com/student-discount) \[Discount] - Get 50% off device security by entering your information into ProxID to get verified as a student.
items.content_html:
Security

  • Shodan [FREE / CREDIT] - Free upgrade (normally 49$) to gain full access to everything shodan has to offer + 100 Export credits. Simply use your academic email address when you signup.
  • Malwarebytes [Discount] - Get 50% off device security by entering your information into ProxID to get verified as a student.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Communication - Custom Communication Systems

*   [GlobaLeaks](https://www.globaleaks.org/) - Whistleblowing software enabling anyone to easily set up and maintain a secure reporting platform. ([Demo](https://demo.globaleaks.org), [Source Code (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/globaleaks/whistleblowing-software)) `AGPL-3.0` `Python/deb/Docker`

### Software / Polls and Events

*   [OpnForm](https://opnform.com) - Beautiful open-source form builder. ([Demo](https://opnform.com/forms/create/guest), [Source Code (⭐2.7k)](https://github.com/JhumanJ/opnform)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP/Nodejs/Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / Communication - Custom Communication Systems

  • GlobaLeaks - Whistleblowing software enabling anyone to easily set up and maintain a secure reporting platform. (Demo, Source Code (⭐1.4k)) AGPL-3.0 Python/deb/Docker
